segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so cute, trying to get cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be surprised when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making a huge puddle, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how focused the kids are on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so calm, and the kids are so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR
